agenda_items.title: Call To Order & Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Mark Davidson calls the meeting to order and conducts roll call.

agenda_items.title: Purpose of the CPOB
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the purpose and objectives of the Community Police Oversight Board.

agenda_items.title: Public Comment / Open Microphone
agenda_items.description: Opportunity for the public to provide comments and feedback.

agenda_items.title: Recruitment Strategy and Process for the Chief of Police
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the recruitment process for the next Dallas Police Chief.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Review and approval of the minutes from the January 14, 2025 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Welcome New CPOB Member Timothy Jackson
agenda_items.description: Introduction of new board member Timothy Jackson.

agenda_items.title: Training
agenda_items.description: Training session on Robert’s Rules of Order and overview of Chapter 8, 'Boards and Commissions'.

agenda_items.title: Reports / Briefings
agenda_items.description: Various reports from board members and staff.
agenda_items.presenter: Michele Andre, Greg Huff, Siara Obasuyi

agenda_items.title: Dallas Police Department Reports / Briefings
agenda_items.description: Reports from the Dallas Police Department.

agenda_items.title: Community Police Oversight Board Reports / Briefings
agenda_items.description: Updates from the Community Police Oversight Board.

agenda_items.title: Board Members Comments
agenda_items.description: Comments and feedback from board members.
